title: Guppies in biological control of mosquitoes
brief_description: Shows how the combined use of biological and chemical measures enabled Japanese scientists to exterminate noxious creatures without exterminating the environment. Biological control of mosquito larvae is contrasted to chemical methods, indicating that guppies are more effective than pesticides.
